item.title: Park Chan-wook and ‘The Sympathizer’ Co-Creator Don McKellar Expelled From Writers Guild
item.description: The creators of the HBO Max limited series allegedly worked during the union’s 2023 strike.

item.title: Park Chan-wook and ‘The Sympathizer’ Co-Creator Don McKellar Expelled From Writers Guild
item.description: The creators of the HBO Max limited series allegedly worked during the union’s 2023 strike.

item.title: Park Chan-wook, Don McKellar Expelled From WGA for Breaking Strike Rules on ‘The Sympathizer’
item.description: The Writers Guild of America announced Friday that it has expelled two members, Park Chan-wook and Don McKellar, for writing on their HBO miniseries “The Sympathizer” during the 2023 strik

item.title: Park Chan-wook, Don McKellar Expelled From WGA for Breaking Strike Rules on ‘The Sympathizer’
item.description: The Writers Guild of America announced Friday that it has expelled two members, Park Chan-wook and Don McKellar, for writing on their HBO miniseries “The Sympathizer” during the 2023 strik

item.title: Writers Guild Calls for Investigation After ‘Late Show’ Cancellation, Citing Bribery Concerns
item.description: The East and West coast branches of the union, which represent scribes on the show, conveyed concerns that the move may be “sacrificing free speech to curry favor with the Trump Administration.”

item.title: Writers Guild Calls for Investigation After ‘Late Show’ Cancellation, Citing Bribery Concerns
item.description: The East and West coast branches of the union, which represent scribes on the show, conveyed concerns that the move may be “sacrificing free speech to curry favor with the Trump Administration.”
